translation.en: ♪ First thing we'd climb a tree ♪
translation.ja: NETFLIX オリジナルシリーズ

translation.en: ♪ And maybe then we'd talk ♪
translation.ja: “我が人生は夢の墓場”

translation.en: ♪ And listen to our thoughts ♪
translation.ja: “永遠の友情の誓いを叫ぼう”

translation.en: ♪ No dress rehearsal ♪
translation.ja: “感動には大げさな言葉が合う”

translation.en: ♪ This is our life ♪
translation.ja: “感動には大げさな言葉が合う” “月明かりの下 木の上で眠る”

translation.en: -♪ This is our life ♪ -♪ You are ahead by a century ♪
translation.ja: アンという名の少女

translation.en: You'll want to hurry and eat if you're to meet the train on time.
translation.ja: 急いで　汽車が着きますよ

translation.en: [sighs] I pray this isn't foolishness, but it's too late now.
translation.ja: 不安はあるけど― 引き返せないわ

translation.en: We made a practical decision. We'll just have to hope for the best.
translation.ja: 最善を望むしかない

translation.en: With any luck, Mrs. Spencer will have picked out a good one.
translation.ja: こちらの希望どおり―

translation.en: A hard worker and obedient, like we asked for.
translation.ja: 従順な男の子が来るといいけど

translation.en: I couldn't tolerate a lazy boy or a sullen boy.
translation.ja: 無愛想な子や怠け者だったら―

translation.en: No, I couldn't abide it and I wouldn't.
translation.ja: 無愛想な子や怠け者だったら― 一緒には暮らせない

translation.en: In spite of all the worry, I'm relieved to know you'll have a regular hand about the place. You can't buy loyalty.
translation.ja: あんたを手伝ってくれれば他人を雇うよりいい

translation.en: You coming in sometime today?
translation.ja: 早く食事にしましょう

translation.en: Matthew Cuthbert, you must be in a state.
translation.ja: マシュー どうしたの？

translation.en: Since when do you sit at the table without washing your hands?
translation.ja: 食前の手洗いを忘れるなんて

translation.en: Let's not forget you were the one convinced of this plan.
translation.ja: 今さら 尻込みしないで

translation.en: You've been set on it since winter, so there's no point fretting now.
translation.ja: あんたの望んだことです

translation.en: Not that I disagree, because I don't.
translation.ja: 私も納得はしてる

translation.en: Will you be ready to set off as soon as you're finished here?
translation.ja: 食べたら行くのでしょう？

translation.en: I will.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Bet it won't take long for Rachel to come a-knocking.
translation.ja: レイチェルが来るわね

translation.en: Lord knows she's got a hunger for gossip like a person starved.
translation.ja: ウワサの種には飛びつくタチだもの

translation.en: I told you to have their supper on the table a half-hour ago.
translation.ja: 食事は まだできないのかい

translation.en: -She needs her diaper changed. -Did you milk the cow?
translation.ja: 先にオムツ替えを 乳搾りは？

translation.en: -No. Not yet, but I-- -Give her to me!
translation.ja: まだです 貸して

translation.en: You want these children to starve to death? Do something right for a change.
translation.ja: うちの子を飢え死にさせる気？

translation.en: You're more trouble than you're worth. Nothing but a miserable piece of trash!
translation.ja: まったく役立たずな子だよ

translation.en: Hurry up! We'll see what Mr. Hammond has to say about this when he gets home.
translation.ja: 急いで 夫がお仕置きするわ

translation.en: Are you quite all right, dear?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: I like imagining better than remembering.
translation.ja: 記憶より想像が好き

translation.en: Why are the worst memories the most insistent?
translation.ja: 嫌な記憶ほど残るわ

translation.en: I wouldn't know. Try to rest.
translation.ja: そう？　少し眠りなさい

translation.en: "If all the world hated you, and believed you wicked...
translation.ja: “周囲の人に悪人と見なされても―”

translation.en: but your own conscience approved of you and absolved you from guilt...
translation.ja: “良心をもって無実と示せば…”

translation.en: you would not be without friends."
translation.ja: “誰かが救ってくれる”

translation.en: I love Jane Eyre, don't you?
translation.ja: 「ジェーン･エア」は好き？

translation.en: I never met her.
translation.ja: 会ったことない

translation.en: I'm glad you've woken. I have so many more questions for you about Green Gables.
translation.ja: グリーン･ゲイブルズのこと聞いても？

translation.en: I'm sure you do.
translation.ja: いいわよ

translation.en: Why do you suppose neither of the Cuthberts ever married?
translation.ja: カスバート姉弟は未婚よね？

translation.en: Did either of them have a tragical romance?
translation.ja: 悲恋でもあったの？

translation.en: -It's none of our business. -But I'm bursting with curiosity!
translation.ja: 立ち入りすぎよ でも気になるの

translation.en: Afternoon.
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: Sir.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: I was wondering if you could, uh, help me. [stammers] Is there, um--?
translation.ja: ちょっと聞きたいんだが…

translation.en: A little girl? You didn't see her? She's just outside.
translation.ja: 女の子なら外にいるでしょう？

translation.en: Wouldn't come in. Darndest thing.
translation.ja: 中で待つよう勧めたんだが

translation.en: But--
translation.ja: だが…

translation.en: Said she preferred to sit outside because there was... What was it now?
translation.ja: 外のほうがいいと言ってね何だか…

translation.en: "More scope for the imagination." That was it.
translation.ja: “想像を働かせたい”だとか

translation.en: She's a case, I should say. I heard her talking to herself out there.
translation.ja: 独りでつぶやいていましたよ

translation.en: But I-I'm not expecting a girl.
translation.ja: 女の子じゃない

translation.en: It's a boy that I have come for.
translation.ja: 男の子を迎えに来たんだ

translation.en: Mrs. Spencer was to bring him over from the asylum.
translation.ja: スペンサー夫人に頼んだ

translation.en: Well, Mrs. Spencer got off the train with that strange snippet. Gave her into my charge. Said you'd be along for her presently.
translation.ja: あなたが迎えに来るからとあの子を置いていった

translation.en: Well, that's all I know about it. I haven't got any more orphans concealed hereabouts.
translation.ja: 私は男の子を隠しちゃいませんよ
一体…

translation.en: I don't understand.
translation.ja: どうなってる

translation.en: Well, I'm sure the girl will be only too happy to tell you every little detail of what happened.
translation.ja: それは あの子に聞けば喜んで話すでしょうな

translation.en: [chuckles] She's got a tongue of her own, that's for certain.
translation.ja: 舌は ついてるようだから

translation.en: Good day to you.
translation.ja: ごきげんよう

translation.en: I suppose you are Matthew Cuthbert of Green Gables?
translation.ja: マシュー･カスバートさん？

translation.en: I'm very glad to see you.
translation.ja: 来ないのかと心配で―

translation.en: I was beginning to be afraid you weren't coming,
translation.ja: 来ないのかと心配で― 何かあったのではと想像してたんです

translation.en: and I was imagining all the things that might've happened to prevent you.
translation.ja: 何かあったのではと想像してたんです

translation.en: I'd made up my mind that if you didn't come for me,
translation.ja: このまま夜になってしまったら―

translation.en: I'd go down the track to that big wild cherry tree,
translation.ja: このまま夜になってしまったら― あの桜の木の上で眠ろうかと

translation.en: and climb up into it and stay all night.
translation.ja: あの桜の木の上で眠ろうかと

translation.en: I wouldn't be a bit afraid, and it would be lovely to sleep in a tree white with bloom in the moonshine, don't you think?
translation.ja: 月明かりの下で花に埋もれて眠るのもいいでしょ？

translation.en: I can also imagine that I'm already a disappointment to you.
translation.ja: 私にガッカリしてます？

translation.en: I'm aware that I'm not much to look at, but even though I'm thin, I'm very strong.
translation.ja: 器量は悪いし 痩せてるけど丈夫です

translation.en: I want you to know that I'm forever grateful that you're adopting me.
translation.ja: 引き取ってくれて感謝します

translation.en: You're a sight for sore eyes, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation.ja: お会いできて光栄です

translation.en: You best come along.
translation.ja: 行こうか

translation.en: -Uh, I'll take your bag. -Oh, I can carry it.
translation.ja: 荷物を持とう 軽いので大丈夫です

translation.en: It isn't heavy.
translation.ja: 軽いので大丈夫です

translation.en: I've got all my worldly goods in it, but it isn't heavy.
translation.ja: 全財産が入ってますけどね

translation.en: And if it isn't carried a certain way,
translation.ja: 持ち方にコツが

translation.en: it falls right open, so I'd better keep it. I've come to know the exact knack of it.
translation.ja: すぐに口が開いてしまうんです

translation.en: I am ecstatic beyond measure that I'm going to belong to you and your sister.
translation.ja: お２人の家族になれてすごくうれしい

translation.en: Ecstatic. I've never belonged to anybody before.
translation.ja: 有頂天です 初めて家族ができました

translation.en: I mean, you and your sister are practically the stuff of fiction.
translation.ja: お２人は物語に出てきそうだわ

translation.en: Two hard-working decent people, lonely all their lives
translation.ja: 静かな土地で暮らす働き者の姉弟が―

translation.en: in their silent house, longing for the love of a child.
translation.ja: 静かな土地で暮らす働き者の姉弟が― 養子を迎えられた

translation.en: And I will strive to be just the best daughter that anybody could ever have.
translation.ja: 最高の娘になるよう努力しますね

translation.en: I'm sure that I could do it.
translation.ja: 自信はあります

translation.en: To be honest, I haven't had much experience at it.
translation.ja: そりゃ 経験はありません

translation.en: I'm not usually brought into the house to be a daughter, so...
translation.ja: 娘になるのは初めてですしね

translation.en: you can well imagine what a blessing this is, and how much my heart is lifted.
translation.ja: だから今は天にも昇る気分です

translation.en: And I've given it a lot of thought,
translation.ja: 心に誓ったの

translation.en: and I am determined that I shall be obedient and dutiful,
translation.ja: 言いつけを守り行儀よくして―

translation.en: and yet, yet lively enough so as to lighten up the place,
translation.ja: 元気に振る舞い家の中を明るくします

translation.en: after you've lived for so many years
translation.ja: お２人の家に想像豊かな子供が加われば

translation.en: without the delights of a happy child and the scope of her imagination.
translation.ja: お２人の家に想像豊かな子供が加われば 楽しいでしょう？

translation.en: Have you always wanted a daughter?
translation.ja: 娘が欲しかったんですか？

translation.en: Always in your heart of hearts?
translation.ja: ずっと 心から？

translation.en: I read once that a daughter is a little girl who grows up to be a friend.
translation.ja: “娘は成長すれば親友になる”と本で読んだわ

translation.en: And it, it gives my heart a thrill to even say it aloud.
translation.ja: 口にしただけでもワクワクする

translation.en: Oh, isn't she lovely?
translation.ja: かわいい子ね

translation.en: -What's her name? -Uh...
translation.ja: 名前は？ ああ　それは―

translation.en: That's, um... Mare.
translation.ja: ああ　それは― “雌馬”だ

translation.en: She doesn't have a name?
translation.ja: 名無しなの？

translation.en: But the right name is so important.
translation.ja: なら つけなきゃ

translation.en: She looks to me like her name is Belle.
translation.ja: 見た感じから… “ベル”がいいわ

translation.en: Hello, Belle. You are a beauty, and I am sure we'll be great friends.
translation.ja: よろしく ベル仲良くしましょうね

translation.en: Mare... [clicks tongue]
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: Bye, tree!
translation.ja: さよなら

translation.en: That cherry tree is my first friend here on the island.
translation.ja: あの木はここでの初の友達よ

translation.en: What did that cherry tree, all white and lacy, make you think of?
translation.ja: 白い花に何を思い浮かべます？

translation.en: Well, now, um... I dunno.
translation.ja: さあな　分からん

translation.en: [Anne] Why, a bride, of course.
translation.ja: 私は“花嫁”よ

translation.en: A bride all in white with a misty veil. I've never seen one, but I imagine what she would look like.
translation.ja: 見たことないけどベールをかぶった花嫁

translation.en: I never expect to be a bride myself. I'm so homely. Nobody would ever want to marry me.
translation.ja: 私は美人じゃないから誰とも結婚できないわ

translation.en: Unless he was a foreign missionary. I suppose a foreign missionary mightn't be very particular.
translation.ja: でも宣教師なら選り好みしないかも

translation.en: But I do hope someday I shall have a white dress with beautiful puff sleeves.
translation.ja: いつか 袖の膨らんだ白いドレスを着たい

translation.en: That is my highest ideal of earthly bliss.
translation.ja: いつか 袖の膨らんだ白いドレスを着たい きっと至福の瞬間ね

translation.en: Am I talking too much?
translation.ja: 私 しゃべりすぎ？

translation.en: People are always telling me that I do, and it seems to cause aggravation.
translation.ja: いつも注意されるんです

translation.en: Would you rather I didn't talk? If you say so, I'll stop.
translation.ja: うるさければ言って

translation.en: I can stop when I make up my mind to it, although it's difficult.
translation.ja: 難しいけど 黙ります

translation.en: I don't mind.
translation.ja: 構わんよ

translation.en: I'm so glad.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: I know that you and I are gonna get along together just fine.
translation.ja: おじさんとは気が合いそう

translation.en: It's such a relief to talk when one wants to
translation.ja: 自由に話せるって幸せ

translation.en: and not be told that children should be seen and not heard.
translation.ja: “子供は黙っていなさい”と―

translation.en: I've had that said to me a million times if I have once.
translation.ja: 今まで何度も言われた

translation.en: People would laugh at me because I use big words, but...
translation.ja: “言葉が大げさだ”ともね

translation.en: but they're exciting and descriptive words, like...
translation.ja: 心が動くと言わずにいられない

translation.en: like "enraptured" and "glorious."
translation.ja: “うっとりする”とか“壮麗な”とか

translation.en: If you have big ideas, you have to use big words to express them, haven't you?
translation.ja: 感動には大げさな言葉が合うわ

translation.en: Well... I suppose so.
translation.ja: まあ… そうだな

translation.en: For example...
translation.ja: 例えば…

translation.en: I am enraptured by this glorious landscape!
translation.ja: この壮麗な景色にうっとりしています！

translation.en: Just careful now. Careful.
translation.ja: 危ないよ　気をつけて

translation.en: [Marilla] Afternoon, Rachel. I've put the kettle on.
translation.ja: レイチェルお湯を沸かしてる

translation.en: Won't you sit down?
translation.ja: どうぞ座って

translation.en: I don't want to interrupt if you're expecting company.
translation.ja: お客が来るなら邪魔しないわ

translation.en: Oh, we've got plenty of time. Matthew won't be back for several hours.
translation.ja: マシューが戻るまで数時間ある

translation.en: I took quite a fright when I saw Matthew starting off today.
translation.ja: 馬車で出かけたから驚いた

translation.en: I can imagine.
translation.ja: そうでしょうね

translation.en: Well, I couldn't imagine what might cause him to leave his crop in the middle of the afternoon.
translation.ja: 仕事を放って昼間から出かけるなんて―

translation.en: I was fearful he'd gone to call for the doctor.
translation.ja: 医者でも呼ぶのかと

translation.en: -Oh, I'm quite well. -Oh, what a relief.
translation.ja: 私は無事よ ああ よかった

translation.en: [exhales] 'Course, now that I have time to think...
translation.ja: よく考えれば―

translation.en: it wouldn't make sense for Matthew to take the time to put on his best set of clothes
translation.ja: わざわざスーツに着替えるわけないわ

translation.en: had there been an emergency.
translation.ja: 医者を呼ぶのにね

translation.en: No. It wouldn't.
translation.ja: ええ　そうよ

translation.en: No, indeed.
translation.ja: 本当に そう

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Oh, for heaven's sake, Marilla.
translation.ja: 教えてよ

translation.en: Matthew's gone to the train station at Bright River.
translation.ja: マシューは駅へ行ったの

translation.en: [exhales] Well, well. Bright River.
translation.ja: あらあら　駅までね

translation.en: He's fetching a hired hand?
translation.ja: 人を雇うの？

translation.en: Yes and no.
translation.ja: そんなところ

translation.en: We're adopting a boy from the orphan asylum in Nova Scotia, and he's arriving today.
translation.ja: 孤児院から男の子を養子に迎えるのよ

translation.en: -Matthew's gone to fetch him. -Marilla Cuthbert,
translation.ja: だから駅へ マリラ　信じられない

translation.en: if you had told me that Matthew was meeting a... kangaroo from Australia,
translation.ja: マリラ　信じられない カンガルーを飼う方がまだマシだわ

translation.en: I couldn't be more surprised.
translation.ja: カンガルーを飼う方がまだマシだわ

translation.en: An orphan boy?
translation.ja: 孤児の男の子？

translation.en: What on earth put such a notion into your head?
translation.ja: 一体 なぜそんなことを？

translation.en: Because I'm gonna tell you plain...
translation.ja: ハッキリ言うけど愚かなことよ

translation.en: you're doing a mighty foolish thing, a risky thing, that's what.
translation.ja: ハッキリ言うけど愚かなことよ 絶対に危険だわ

translation.en: [Anne] I cannot believe that I'm going to get to live somewhere so beautiful.
translation.ja: こんな美しい所に住めるなんて

translation.en: Dreams don't often come true, do they?
translation.ja: 夢は叶わないものなのに

translation.en: But just now I feel pretty nearly perfectly happy.
translation.ja: 今の私はほぼ完璧に幸せだわ

translation.en: Although I can't feel exactly perfectly happy because, well...
translation.ja: 完璧とは言い切れないの

translation.en: what color would you call this?
translation.ja: この髪 何色だと？

translation.en: It's red, isn't it?
translation.ja: 赤じゃないかな

translation.en: Yes, it's red.
translation.ja: そう　赤毛なの

translation.en: Now you see why I can't be perfectly happy. Nobody could who has red hair. It's...
translation.ja: こんな赤毛では完璧な幸せなんて無理よ

translation.en: my lifelong sorrow.
translation.ja: 一生の悲しみね

translation.en: You don't know what you're getting.
translation.ja: とんでもないわ

translation.en: You're letting a... strange child into your house, and you don't know a thing about him.
translation.ja: どこの馬の骨とも知らない子供と暮らすのよ

translation.en: Why, only last week, I was reading in the paper
translation.ja: 先週 新聞で読んだわ

translation.en: how a man and his wife, uh, up west of the island,
translation.ja: 西の方に暮らしてたある夫婦が―

translation.en: took an orphan boy out of the asylum, and he set fire to their home. At night.
translation.ja: 孤児を養子にしたら夜中 家に火をつけられたの

translation.en: Set it on purpose, Marilla.
translation.ja: つまり放火よ

translation.en: And they nearly burnt to a crisp in their beds!
translation.ja: 夫婦は焼死寸前

translation.en: Now, if you would have asked for my advice on this matter,
translation.ja: ねえ 一言 先に相談してくれれば…

translation.en: -which you didn't do-- -Sugar?
translation.ja: 砂糖は？

translation.en: I would have told you for mercy's sake not to think of such a thing, that's what!
translation.ja: 私は必死になって止めてたわよ 絶対にね

translation.en: I don't deny there's something in what you say, Rachel. I've...
translation.ja: 言いたいことは分かるわ

translation.en: I've had some qualms myself.
translation.ja: 私も少し不安だもの

translation.en: How could you not?
translation.ja: 当然よ

translation.en: Matthew is getting on in years, and his heart's been bothering him.
translation.ja: でも弟も年だし心臓も良くない

translation.en: A boy will be a great help.
translation.ja: 男手は助かるわ

translation.en: It isn't as if he's coming from overseas or the States. He's from Nova Scotia.
translation.ja: 外国からではなくノバスコシアの子よ

translation.en: Can't be much different than ourselves.
translation.ja: 私たちと違わない

translation.en: Well, there is some comfort in that,
translation.ja: 少しはマシね

translation.en: knowing he's not some London street Arab. Or some French ruffian.
translation.ja: ロンドンのホームレスやフランス人じゃない

translation.en: An orphan, Marilla.
translation.ja: でも孤児院の子よ

translation.en: Matthew's been terrible set on it.
translation.ja: 弟が乗り気なの

translation.en: Well, I only hope and pray it works all right.
translation.ja: それじゃ 祈るしかない

translation.en: Only don't say I didn't warn you if he burns Green Gables down,
translation.ja: 忠告はしたからね 放火されたり 毒殺されても知らない

translation.en: or puts strychnine in the well.
translation.ja: 放火されたり 毒殺されても知らない

translation.en: I heard of a case over in New Brunswick where an orphan asylum child did just that,
translation.ja: 孤児が井戸に毒を入れた事件があったの

translation.en: and the whole family died in fearful agonies.
translation.ja: 一家全員 苦しんで死んだわ

translation.en: Only it was a girl in that instant.
translation.ja: 女の子だけど

translation.en: Well, we're not getting a girl.
translation.ja: うちは女の子じゃない

translation.en: [Anne] Oh, Mr. Cuthbert!
translation.ja: カスバートさんこの道は何ていうの？

translation.en: -What do they call this place? -The Avenue.
translation.ja: カスバートさんこの道は何ていうの？ “並木道”

translation.en: I suppose it is kind of pretty.
translation.ja: なかなか きれいだ

translation.en: Oh, "pretty" doesn't seem the right word to use. Nor "beautiful," either.
translation.ja: いいえ “美しい”でも足りないくらい

translation.en: They don't go far enough.
translation.ja: もっと上よ

translation.en: It's... wonderful.
translation.ja: そうね… “素晴らしい”

translation.en: Wonderful.
translation.ja: 素晴らしいわ

translation.en: The first thing I ever saw that couldn't be improved upon by the imagination.
translation.ja: 想像したこともない景色よ

translation.en: Other people may call it "The Avenue,"
translation.ja: “並木道”だろうと私は こう呼ぶわ

translation.en: but I shall always call it "the White Way of Delight."
translation.ja: “並木道”だろうと私は こう呼ぶわ “喜びの白い道”

translation.en: [Matthew] This here is Barry's Pond.
translation.ja: “バリーの池”だ

translation.en: [Anne] I don't like that name, either. I shall call it...
translation.ja: その名前もつまらない私なら…

translation.en: let me see...
translation.ja: 何がいいかしら

translation.en: "the Lake of Shining Waters."
translation.ja: “輝きの湖”がいい

translation.en: Yes, that's the right name for it.
translation.ja: これよ　ピッタリだわ

translation.en: I-I know because of the thrill.
translation.ja: ゾクゾクしたもの

translation.en: Do things ever give you a thrill?
translation.ja: そういうことある？

translation.en: Uh, I don't rightly know.
translation.ja: よく分からん

translation.en: There has to be something.
translation.ja: きっと あるはずよ

translation.en: Well, now, um... [clicks tongue]
translation.ja: そうだな…

translation.en: I suppose it kind of gives me a thrill
translation.ja: ゾクゾクと震えがくることがある

translation.en: to see those ugly white grubs spade up in the cucumber beds.
translation.ja: ゾクゾクと震えがくることがある キュウリの苗床に幼虫を見た時にな

translation.en: Well, I suppose I can imagine that.
translation.ja: それ 分かるわ

translation.en: I hate the look of them, and like to be rid of them.
translation.ja: 気持ち悪いからすぐ始末する

translation.en: I suppose I gave Mrs. Hammond a thrill, then. She was happy to be rid of me after her husband died.
translation.ja: ハモンドさんも震えがきて私を捨てたのね

translation.en: Who's Mrs. Hammond?
translation.ja: ハモンドさん？

translation.en: I worked for her family taking care of the children for a few years.
translation.ja: 私はその家で子守をしてたの

translation.en: She had eight.
translation.ja: 全部で８人

translation.en: It sure seems to make some people angry when they have so many children.
translation.ja: 子だくさんだと親はイラつく

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Hammond were certainly vexed all the time.
translation.ja: ハモンド夫妻も気が立ってた

translation.en: [Mr. Hammond] Move, scarecrow!
translation.ja: やせっぽちめ

translation.en: -[Anne] Please, please! [yelps, sobs] -This'll teach ya.
translation.ja: どうか許して

translation.en: -Mr. Hammond? -[barks]
translation.ja: ハモンドさん？

translation.en: [yells] Mrs. Hammond! Mrs. Hammond!
translation.ja: おばさん！　来て！

translation.en: -Is anything the matter? -No. Nothing.
translation.ja: どうした？ いえ　別に

translation.en: I was, I was startled by the geese, is all.
translation.ja: 雁(がん)に驚いただけです

translation.en: Don't you just love them? The geese? I do.
translation.ja: 雁って大好き

translation.en: They're a very romantical species of bird.
translation.ja: ロマンチックな鳥よね

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't know about that.
translation.ja: よく分からんな

translation.en: Did you know they mate for life?
translation.ja: つがいになって添い遂げるんですって

translation.en: They choose each other out of all the other geese in the world,
translation.ja: つがいになって添い遂げるんですって 互いを選び出して死ぬまで支え合うの

translation.en: and they stay together until death do they part.
translation.ja: 互いを選び出して死ぬまで支え合うの

translation.en: Well, now...
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Uh, we're pretty near home. Just another mile or so.
translation.ja: あと少しで うちに着くぞ

translation.en: "Home."
translation.ja: “うち”か

translation.en: What a wonderful word.
translation.ja: 幸せな響きだわ

translation.en: -Green Gables. -[clicks tongue] Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.ja: グリーン･ゲイブルズ

translation.en: [Anne] I have pinched myself so many times today.
translation.ja: 何度も腕をつねってた

translation.en: Every little while, this horrible sickening feeling would come over me,
translation.ja: 時々 嫌な予感がこみ上げるの

translation.en: and I'd be so afraid that this was all a dream.
translation.ja: “全部 夢かも”ってね

translation.en: But I just had to one more time.
translation.ja: もう一度 つねった

translation.en: This is real.
translation.ja: 夢じゃない

translation.en: Green Gables is real and we're home.
translation.ja: グリーン･ゲイブルズは本物だわ

translation.en: Mare. [clicks tongue]
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: Matthew Cuthbert, who's that?
translation.ja: マシュー　その子は誰？

translation.en: Where is the boy?
translation.ja: 男の子はどこ？

translation.en: There wasn't any boy.
translation.ja: いなかった

translation.en: There was only her.
translation.ja: この子だけだ

translation.en: [Marilla] No boy?
translation.ja: いない？

translation.en: But there must have been a boy. We sent word to Mrs. Spencer to bring us a boy.
translation.ja: スペンサーさんには男の子を頼んだわ

translation.en: Well, she didn't.
translation.ja: だが 来たのは―

translation.en: She brought her.
translation.ja: この子だった

translation.en: I asked the stationmaster.
translation.ja: 駅長にも確認した

translation.en: I had to bring her home.
translation.ja: 仕方ないだろう

translation.en: She couldn't be left there, no matter where the mistake had come in.
translation.ja: 手違いだとしても置き去りにはできん

translation.en: [exhales] Well, this is a pretty piece of business.
translation.ja: 困ったわね送り返しましょう

translation.en: -She's gotta go back. -You don't want me.
translation.ja: 困ったわね送り返しましょう 違うのね

translation.en: [gasps] I should have expected it.
translation.ja: 気づけばよかった

translation.en: I might have known nobody would really want me.
translation.ja: 私を欲しがるはずない

translation.en: Oh, for heaven's sake, child! What are you doing on the ground?
translation.ja: そんなところに座って何なの？

translation.en: Now you listen here and stand up.
translation.ja: 立ちなさい

translation.en: -What do you make of this? -I, um...
translation.ja: どうするの？ その…

translation.en: Because she's traveled a long way to be disappointed.
translation.ja: やっと着いたのにガッカリしてるんだ

translation.en: Well, she shouldn't be here. You should never have brought her home.
translation.ja: だからってうちには置けません

translation.en: -[Matthew echoing] She's had a shock. -[Marilla] She's not the only one.
translation.ja: ショックを受けてる こっちもよ

translation.en: Enough of this foolishness. Come along inside.
translation.ja: もうたくさん 中に お入り

translation.en: [distant, echoing] I'm speaking to you, child.
translation.ja: 聞いてるの？

translation.en: Little girl, that's enough now.
translation.ja: いいかげんにして

translation.en: Little girl? Little girl!
translation.ja: ちょっと お嬢さん？

translation.en: Little girl?
translation.ja: 私が―

translation.en: I wish I was anything but.
translation.ja: 男ならよかった

translation.en: There's no point in crying. There's been a mistake, is all.
translation.ja: 泣くことないわただの手違いよ

translation.en: We're not gonna turn you out of doors tonight.
translation.ja: すぐに帰しはしない

translation.en: What is your name?
translation.ja: 名前は？

translation.en: What does it matter?
translation.ja: なぜ聞くの？

translation.en: I won't be here long enough for you to remember.
translation.ja: すぐに お別れするのに

translation.en: You will mind your manners and answer the question.
translation.ja: いいから答えなさい

translation.en: Please... call me Cordelia.
translation.ja: だったら― “コーデリア”と

translation.en: Call you Cordelia? Is that your name?
translation.ja: それが あなたの名前ね？

translation.en: Or Penelope.
translation.ja: “ペネロペ”でも

translation.en: Penelope has a very tragical ring to it.
translation.ja: 悲劇的な響きだから

translation.en: What is your name, child?
translation.ja: 本当の名前は？

translation.en: Couldn't you call me either of those?
translation.ja: 今 言ったのはダメ？

translation.en: My name is Anne.
translation.ja: 私はアンです

translation.en: Plain Anne.
translation.ja: ただの“アン”

translation.en: Anne is a fine name. A sensible name.
translation.ja: いい名前じゃないの分かりやすい

translation.en: Could you please spell it with an "E" when you speak it?
translation.ja: つづりの最後に“Ｅ”をつけて

translation.en: Anne with an "E" looks much more distinguished.
translation.ja: そのほうが立派だから

translation.en: Very well, then.
translation.ja: 分かったわ　Ｅのつくアン

translation.en: Anne, with an "E," it's time to come inside.
translation.ja: 分かったわ　Ｅのつくアン 立って 中に入りなさい

translation.en: Get yourself up now.
translation.ja: 立って 中に入りなさい

translation.en: I knew it.
translation.ja: やっぱり

translation.en: This is a lovely home.
translation.ja: ステキな家

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me at the train station that you didn't want me?
translation.ja: なぜ言ってくれなかったの？

translation.en: Why didn't you just leave me there?
translation.ja: 置いて帰ってほしかった

translation.en: If I hadn't seen the White Way of Delight or the Lake of Shining Waters, this wouldn't be so hard.
translation.ja: 喜びの白い道や輝きの湖を見たくなかったわ

translation.en: -[Marilla] What on earth does she mean? -It's just...
translation.ja: 一体 何の話？

translation.en: It's just a conversation we had on the road.
translation.ja: ここまでの道すがら話したことだ

translation.en: I'll put the mare in.
translation.ja: 馬を戻す

translation.en: [exhales] Take off your hat. Lay it and your bag on the bench.
translation.ja: 帽子を脱いでカバンを置きなさい

translation.en: I simply don't understand. Were there no boys at the asylum?
translation.ja: 孤児院に男の子はいないの？

translation.en: [Anne] There was an abundance of them.
translation.ja: 大勢います

translation.en: But Mrs. Spencer said distinctly that you wanted a girl about my age,
translation.ja: スペンサーさんの話では― ご希望はこの年頃の女の子だと

translation.en: and the matron thought that I would do.
translation.ja: ご希望はこの年頃の女の子だと

translation.en: This is what comes of sending word and not going ourselves. Follow me.
translation.ja: 伝言で頼んだのが間違いね さあ こっちよ

translation.en: Don't dally.
translation.ja: さあ こっちよ

translation.en: I'm sorry to disappoint you, but there's nothing to be done.
translation.ja: 悪いけど何もできないわ

translation.en: We want a boy to help Matthew with the farm work. A girl would be of no use to us. Do you understand?
translation.ja: 農場の手伝いを望んでたけど女の子じゃ務まらない

translation.en: -I can't say that I do. -I beg your pardon?
translation.ja: 私にもできます 何です？

translation.en: I don't mean any disrespect, but couldn't I do the farm chores even though I'm a girl?
translation.ja: 失礼ですが農作業なら私もできます

translation.en: That's not the way of things, and you know it.
translation.ja: 女の子には向きません

translation.en: But couldn't I?
translation.ja: できるわ

translation.en: I'm as strong as a boy, and I prefer to be outdoors instead of cooped up in a kitchen.
translation.ja: 腕力には自信があるし台所仕事より好き

translation.en: I don't understand the conundrum.
translation.ja: なぜダメなの？

translation.en: For example, what if suddenly there were no boys in the world?
translation.ja: この世に男の子が１人もいなくなったら？

translation.en: -None at all? -Fiddlesticks.
translation.ja: この世に男の子が１人もいなくなったら？ まさか

translation.en: It doesn't make sense that girls aren't allowed to do farm work
translation.ja: 女に農場の仕事が無理なんてヘンよ

translation.en: when girls can do anything a boy can do and more.
translation.ja: 女に農場の仕事が無理なんてヘンよ 男の子より有能だわ

translation.en: Do you consider yourself to be delicate and incapable? Because I certainly don't.
translation.ja: あなたも自分が無能だと思わないでしょ？

translation.en: Anyway, since I'm here now, couldn't you consider it?
translation.ja: 私をここに置くこと 考えて

translation.en: I could not. And put those fool notions out of your head.
translation.ja: 妙な期待はしないでちょうだい

translation.en: [exhales] Come along. Let's get you washed up for supper.
translation.ja: 食前に手を洗って

translation.en: Oh, good gracious, child! What's happened here?
translation.ja: 何てこと　そのアザは？

translation.en: I was pinching myself a lot today to prove that this was all true.
translation.ja: 夢じゃないと確かめたくてつねった

translation.en: Well, you're not eating at all.
translation.ja: 食べないの？

translation.en: I can't. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 食欲がありません

translation.en: I'm in the depths of despair.
translation.ja: 絶望の底にいるの

translation.en: Can you eat when you're in the depths of despair?
translation.ja: 絶望の底で食欲がわく？

translation.en: I've never been in the depths of despair, so I can't say.
translation.ja: 経験がないから答えようがない

translation.en: Well, did you ever imagine that you were in the depths of despair?
translation.ja: 絶望の底を想像したことは？

translation.en: No, I didn't.
translation.ja: ないわ

translation.en: Well, it's a very uncomfortable feeling, indeed.
translation.ja: ものすごく嫌な気分よ

translation.en: When you try to eat, a big lump comes right up into your throat,
translation.ja: 食べたくても何かがこみ上げて―

translation.en: and you can't swallow anything.
translation.ja: 飲み込めないの

translation.en: Not even if it was a chocolate caramel.
translation.ja: チョコキャラメルでもね

translation.en: I had chocolate caramel once two years ago, and it was simply delicious.
translation.ja: ２年前に食べたけどおいしかった

translation.en: I hope you won't be offended that I can't eat. Everything is extremely nice.
translation.ja: とてもおいしそうなのにごめんなさい

translation.en: I guess she's just tired. Best put her to bed, hmm?
translation.ja: 疲れてるんだ寝かせてやろう

translation.en: Fetch your bag and follow me.
translation.ja: ついていらっしゃい

translation.en: [exhales] Well, undress. Quick as you can. Get to bed.
translation.ja: 着替えて 早く寝なさい

translation.en: I'll come back in a few minutes for the candle.
translation.ja: ろうそくは取りに来る

translation.en: Good night.
translation.ja: よく眠って

translation.en: How can you call it a good night
translation.ja: 眠れると思う？

translation.en: when you know this must be the very worst night I've ever had?
translation.ja: 私の人生最悪の夜だと知ってるはずよ

translation.en: Oh, that is a filthy habit!
translation.ja: そんなもの吸って

translation.en: Daresay a man's got a right to smoke...
translation.ja: 今夜は構わんだろう

translation.en: when his mind's burdened.
translation.ja: 悩んでるんだ

translation.en: I daresay yours is, too.
translation.ja: そっちも同じだろ

translation.en: Yes, this is certainly a fine kettle of fish.
translation.ja: ええ　困ったものですよ

translation.en: One of us will have to drive over and see Mrs. Spencer tomorrow, for certain.
translation.ja: 明日 スペンサーさんの所へ

translation.en: The girl will have to be sent back.
translation.ja: 引き取れない

translation.en: Yep, I suppose so.
translation.ja: かもしれん

translation.en: You suppose so? Don't you know it?
translation.ja: “かもしれん”？

translation.en: Well, now, it... seems a pity.
translation.ja: いや　ただ… 送り返すのは気の毒でな

translation.en: I mean, to send her back?
translation.ja: 送り返すのは気の毒でな

translation.en: She's so set on staying.
translation.ja: ここにいたがってる

translation.en: Matthew Cuthbert, do you mean to say you think we ought to keep her?
translation.ja: マシュー あの子をここに置く気？

translation.en: No, no, no. I-I-I...
translation.ja: その　やっぱり…

translation.en: -No, I suppose not. -I should say not!
translation.ja: 難しい 無理ですよ

translation.en: What good would she be to us?
translation.ja: 役に立たないもの

translation.en: We might be some good to her.
translation.ja: 私らが役立つかも

translation.en: I believe that child has bewitched you.
translation.ja: 魔法でもかけられた？

translation.en: I can see it plain as plain you want to keep her.
translation.ja: 引き取りたいと顔に書いてある

translation.en: She's a real interesting kind of person.
translation.ja: なかなか面白い子だ

translation.en: That's one way to put it.
translation.ja: ある意味ね

translation.en: You should have heard her talk, coming from the station.
translation.ja: 馬車での会話を聞かせたかった

translation.en: Well, she can talk fast enough, and it's nothing in her favor.
translation.ja: あんな早口な子は感心しません

translation.en: I don't mind the conversation.
translation.ja: 私は気にならん

translation.en: I don't like children who have so much to say.
translation.ja: 口の達者な子は嫌い

translation.en: There's something I don't understand about her.
translation.ja: なんだか変わってるし

translation.en: No, she's gotta be dispatched straightway back where she came from.
translation.ja: やはり元の孤児院に返しましょう

translation.en: I could hire a boy to help me, and, uh, she could be company for you.
translation.ja: 手伝いは雇う あの子は話し相手に

translation.en: I'm not suffering for company. And I'm not gonna keep her.
translation.ja: 要りませんあの子は引き取らない

translation.en: Well, now... it's just as you say, of course.
translation.ja: そうか そう言うなら いい

translation.en: I'm going to bed.
translation.ja: もう寝るよ

translation.en: [Anne] Dearest Snow Queen...
translation.ja: 雪の女王様

translation.en: I accept your token offering.
translation.ja: お恵みに感謝します

translation.en: Had I a book, I would press these sacred blossoms between its pages,
translation.ja: これが本のお話なら清らかな花を挟み―

translation.en: so that I could be forever reminded of this treasured moment.
translation.ja: 大切な瞬間を忘れないようにします

translation.en: Nevertheless...
translation.ja: とにかく

translation.en: I, Princess Cordelia...
translation.ja: わたくし― コーデリア王女は…

translation.en: shall cherish this gift always.
translation.ja: この贈り物を忘れません

translation.en: -Let my kiss prove my devotion. -[Marilla] What are you doing?
translation.ja: あなたに捧(ささ)げるキスを… 何してるの？

translation.en: It's time you were dressed.
translation.ja: 早く着替えて

translation.en: I was imagining that this morning was different than what it is.
translation.ja: 現実とは違うことを想像してたんです

translation.en: I was making believe that I was a beautiful princess,
translation.ja: 美しい王女様になったつもりで―

translation.en: and that this was my sacred chamber, high in a tall stone spire.
translation.ja: 教会の塔のてっぺんで祈りを捧げていたの

translation.en: Never mind your chatter.
translation.ja: おしゃべりは結構

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: It's just that your gable room and your lovely old cherry tree
translation.ja: 切妻屋根の部屋から桜を見ていたら―

translation.en: provide such scope for the imagination.
translation.ja: 想像が膨らんでしまって

translation.en: I've also been wishing with all my might
translation.ja: 祈っていたんです 私を引き取ると言ってくれますようにと

translation.en: that you'd tell me that you'd decided that I could stay.
translation.ja: 私を引き取ると言ってくれますようにと

translation.en: Pack that inside and come downstairs.
translation.ja: 支度しなさい

translation.en: We'll be driving to see Mrs. Spencer after breakfast.
translation.ja: 朝食が済んだら出発よ

translation.en: Put that down at once!
translation.ja: 元に戻しなさい

translation.en: -Did you take anything? -No!
translation.ja: 何か取った？ まさか

translation.en: I was only memorizing.
translation.ja: 記憶してただけ

translation.en: Let me see.
translation.ja: 見せて

translation.en: Stop your snooping and come to breakfast.
translation.ja: さっさと食事して

translation.en: [Anne] I'm pretty hungry.
translation.ja: お腹ペコペコ

translation.en: The world doesn't seem such a howling wilderness as it did last night.
translation.ja: 昨夜は世界が嵐の荒野に思えたわ

translation.en: I'm glad it's a pretty morning, so we won't be driving back in the rain.
translation.ja: 晴れてよかった 雨に濡れながら戻るのは悲しいもの

translation.en: That would be extremely difficult to bear.
translation.ja: 雨に濡れながら戻るのは悲しいもの

translation.en: It's all very well to read sorrowful stories,
translation.ja: 悲劇を読んで― 不幸な主人公になりきるのは楽しいわ

translation.en: and imagine yourself living through them heroically, but...
translation.ja: 不幸な主人公になりきるのは楽しいわ

translation.en: it's not so easy when you're actually woeful.
translation.ja: でも実際に不幸なら…

translation.en: Oh, for pity's sake, hold your tongue.
translation.ja: 口を閉じて

translation.en: You talk entirely too much.
translation.ja: しゃべりすぎよ

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.ja: 分かりました

translation.en: Just so's you know, I sent word to see if that French boy is available through harvest.
translation.ja: 収穫期にはフランス人を雇うことにしたよ

translation.en: -Gracious me! -I can milk a cow and split wood.
translation.ja: 何です？ 乳搾り まき割り―

translation.en: I can wash clothes, iron, dust, sweep and so many other things.
translation.ja: 洗濯にアイロン掃除もできます

translation.en: There is no end to what I could accomplish. I will take care of these dishes for you, Miss Cuthbert. You will see.
translation.ja: ここに残れるなら皿洗いでも何でもするわ

translation.en: I'll do them right.
translation.ja: ちゃんとやれる

translation.en: Be careful with the kettle. It's very hot. Use both hands.
translation.ja: 熱いから両手で持つのよ

translation.en: I see it clear now. This very idea was folly.
translation.ja: 養子をとろうなんて間違ってた

translation.en: You can't make up a family. Only kin is kin.
translation.ja: 血縁がなければ家族にはなれない

translation.en: Surely you'll be needing Anne more than ever since your husband's passing.
translation.ja: ご主人を亡くして今以上にアンが必要では？

translation.en: [Mrs. Hammond] I don't want her.
translation.ja: 要らないわ

translation.en: I'm moving to my sister's, and I got no reason to take her.
translation.ja: 姉と暮らすから

translation.en: -We're overcrowded as it is. -I don't need another mouth to feed.
translation.ja: うちも満員です 養えないの

translation.en: [Anne] But I can help you.
translation.ja: 働きます

translation.en: -[sighs] -Haven't I been of help to you?
translation.ja: 手伝うから置いていかないで

translation.en: -Please don't leave me here. -You're not kin.
translation.ja: 手伝うから置いていかないで 血縁がない

translation.en: I got enough kin. You're taking her back, and that's final.
translation.ja: 子供は足りてるのお返しする

translation.en: [gasps] I'm so sorry! Nothing's broken!
translation.ja: すみません　大丈夫よ

translation.en: Oh, you'll never keep me now.
translation.ja: 送り返す？

translation.en: I was never going to keep you.
translation.ja: 気は変わらないわ

translation.en: [exhales] I'll be back in time for tea.
translation.ja: お茶までには戻る

translation.en: Anne...
translation.ja: アン

translation.en: -Bye, Mr. Cuthbert. -I...
translation.ja: さようなら

translation.en: I didn't say I'd hire a boy to get rid of you.
translation.ja: フランス人を雇うと言ったのは―

translation.en: It was in hopes that you could stay.
translation.ja: お前を残せるかと…

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: I'll never forget you.
translation.ja: 忘れないわ

translation.en: You take care now...
translation.ja: 達者でな

translation.en: Anne with an "E."
translation.ja: Ｅのつくアン

translation.en: Oh, for heaven's sake! [clicks tongue]
translation.ja: いいかげんにして

translation.en: My brother is a ridiculous man.
translation.ja: 弟は困った人だわ

translation.en: I think he's lovely.
translation.ja: いえ　いい人よ

translation.en: He's ever so sympathetic, and he didn't seem to mind how much I talked.
translation.ja: 私の話も聞いてくれたわ

translation.en: In fact, he seemed to like it.
translation.ja: 楽しそうに

translation.en: I felt he was a kindred spirit as soon as ever I saw him.
translation.ja: 会ってすぐに気が合うと思った

translation.en: You're both queer enough, that's for sure.
translation.ja: 変わり者同士ね

translation.en: I've made up my mind to enjoy this drive.
translation.ja: 道中を楽しむわ

translation.en: It's been my experience you can nearly always enjoy something if you make up your mind firmly that you will.
translation.ja: 心の持ちようで大抵のことは楽しめるもの

translation.en: Of course, you must make up your mind firmly.
translation.ja: 心に決めるのが大事

translation.en: I believe this is something that you and I have in common.
translation.ja: 私たちに共通点ができた

translation.en: [Anne] I wish I was a seagull.
translation.ja: カモメになりたい

translation.en: They're the most carefree of all the birds, don't you think?
translation.ja: 鳥の中で一番 気楽そう

translation.en: Look. Wild roses!
translation.ja: 見て バラの花よ

translation.en: Isn't pink just the most bewitching color? I love it, but I can't wear it.
translation.ja: ピンクって最高にかわいい色よね

translation.en: Redheaded people can't wear pink, not even in the imagination.
translation.ja: でも赤毛だから着られないの

translation.en: Know of anybody whose hair was red when she was younger, but got to be another color when she grew up?
translation.ja: 成長して髪の色が変わる人っています？

translation.en: I shouldn't think it likely.
translation.ja: いないわ

translation.en: There's another hope gone.
translation.ja: また夢が消えた

translation.en: "My life is a perfect graveyard of buried hopes."
translation.ja: “我が人生は夢の墓場”

translation.en: I read that sentence in a book once. I say it to comfort myself whenever I'm disappointed in anything.
translation.ja: 失望した時は小説の一節に慰められるの

translation.en: I don't see where the comforting comes in, myself.
translation.ja: どこが慰めになるのやら

translation.en: Because it sounds so romantic, as if I were a heroine in a storybook.
translation.ja: 主人公の気分になって浸れるからよ

translation.en: [Marilla] You must have gone to school.
translation.ja: 学校へは？

translation.en: [Anne] Not a great deal, although I went when I was at the asylum. I love school.
translation.ja: 孤児院にいた時は通ってたわ 好きだったけど―

translation.en: But in a household with so much to attend to, the children, the cooking, the chores,
translation.ja: 好きだったけど― 里親の家では忙しくて行けなかった

translation.en: it just wasn't an option.
translation.ja: 里親の家では忙しくて行けなかった

translation.en: Is there a reason why Green Gables is so secluded?
translation.ja: なぜ静かな土地に暮らすの？

translation.en: [Marilla] Reason?
translation.ja: なぜって…

translation.en: My family wasn't inclined toward idle chatter.
translation.ja: 話好きじゃない一族なのよ

translation.en: [Anne] Do you miss your parents terribly?
translation.ja: ご両親が恋しい？

translation.en: [Marilla] They lived good Christian lives. You can't begrudge God for bringing them home.
translation.ja: 長生きしたから そうでも死んだらお別れよ

translation.en: I suppose not.
translation.ja: そうかしら

translation.en: You suppose not?
translation.ja: 違う？

translation.en: Why is it you find yourself an orphan?
translation.ja: いつ親を亡くしたの？

translation.en: Well, it happened when I was an infant.
translation.ja: 赤ん坊の頃よ

translation.en: I'd like to know the circumstances if you've a mind to tell them.
translation.ja: よければ聞かせてくれる？

translation.en: I don't mind telling stories.
translation.ja: 話すのは大好き

translation.en: "Somewhere in a far-off land, in a place whose name I do not care to remember,
translation.ja: 名前は忘れたけどはるか遠くの ある国に―

translation.en: a gentleman lived not long ago.
translation.ja: １人の紳士が住んでいました

translation.en: One of those with a lance, and an ancient shield on a shelf
translation.ja: １人の紳士が住んでいました ヤリや盾を飾り痩せた馬と猟犬を飼って…

translation.en: who keeps a skinny nag and a greyhound for racing--"
translation.ja: ヤリや盾を飾り痩せた馬と猟犬を飼って…

translation.en: -How dare you! -What?
translation.ja: ふざけないで

translation.en: Do you take me for a fool?
translation.ja: バカにしてる？

translation.en: Well, it's just a much better story than mine.
translation.ja: 物語のほうが楽しいわ

translation.en: I didn't ask for any story, I asked for yours.
translation.ja: あなた自身の話をして

translation.en: If you can't tell the truth, then I have no time for you.
translation.ja: 本当の話が聞きたいの

translation.en: If you let me tell you what I imagine about myself, you'll find it ever so much more interesting.
translation.ja: こうだったらいいなと想像した話は？

translation.en: Wishing something is different than it is will not make it so!
translation.ja: 想像は実現しないでしょ

translation.en: Truer words were never spoken.
translation.ja: 確かにそのとおりね

translation.en: My parents were Walter and Bertha Shirley.
translation.ja: 両親の名はウォルターとバーサ

translation.en: They were newlyweds, and they were poor as church mice.
translation.ja: 結婚したばかりでとても貧しかった

translation.en: They died of a fever when I was three months old.
translation.ja: 私が３ヵ月の時熱病で死んだ

translation.en: So I've been earning my keep for as long as I can remember, and...
translation.ja: だから私は幼い頃から子守を

translation.en: I suppose I was lucky that I was placed out, instead of staying in the asylum.
translation.ja: 置いてくれる家があって恵まれてたわ

translation.en: I never understood it.
translation.ja: でも不思議だった

translation.en: If children are such a burden, then why do people have so many of them?
translation.ja: 世話を大変がるのにどの家も子だくさんなの

translation.en: Nevertheless, it's a shame I'll never have the opportunity.
translation.ja: なのに私はなれないなんて悲しい

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.ja: 何に？

translation.en: To be one.
translation.ja: 誰かの子供

translation.en: Anne!
translation.ja: アン！

translation.en: No! Go home! Go home!
translation.ja: こら！　あっちいけ

translation.en: Oh, my Lord!
translation.ja: 驚いたわ

translation.en: Are you all right?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: -Shh. -Oh, dear Lord!
translation.ja: まったく もう

translation.en: -I'm fine. Here you are. Shh. -Oh, whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.ja: 私は平気です

translation.en: It's all right. It's all right, Belle.
translation.ja: さあ　大丈夫よ

translation.en: There is no need to worry anymore, Belle.
translation.ja: ベル　もう心配ない

translation.en: -Belle? -That's her name.
translation.ja: ベル？ この子の名前

translation.en: -[chuckles] Wasn't that an adventure? -Wasn't it just!
translation.ja: ビックリしたわ ええ　本当に

translation.en: -You're sure you're all right? -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: ケガしなかった？

translation.en: You were very level-headed.
translation.ja: 冷静だったわね

translation.en: I'm used to a ruckus.
translation.ja: 慣れてるもの

translation.en: My, you're the last folks I was looking for today, but I'm real glad to see you.
translation.ja: あら　思いがけないお客様ね いらっしゃい

translation.en: And how are you doing, dear Anne?
translation.ja: アンも元気？

translation.en: I'm well enough, thank you.
translation.ja: はい　元気です

translation.en: What brings you by, Miss Cuthbert?
translation.ja: 何のご用？

translation.en: Well, the fact is, Mrs. Spencer, there's been a queer mistake somewhere. I've come over to see where it is.
translation.ja: 妙な手違いが起こった訳を確認したくて来たの

translation.en: Matthew and I sent word for you to bring us a boy from the asylum.
translation.ja: 私たちは男の子を望んでたのよ

translation.en: We told your brother Robert to tell you we wanted a boy.
translation.ja: ロバートにもそう伝えたわ

translation.en: Marilla Cuthbert, you don't say so!
translation.ja: 何てことでしょう

translation.en: But Robert sent word through his daughter Nancy that you wanted a girl.
translation.ja: 弟の娘から“女の子”と聞いてた

translation.en: Oh, that Nancy is a terrible flighty thing. I've often had to scold her for her heedlessness.
translation.ja: あの子はうっかり者で私もよく叱ってるの

translation.en: I'm dreadfully sorry about this.
translation.ja: 申し訳ないわ

translation.en: It was our own fault.
translation.ja: こっちも悪いの

translation.en: We should have come to you ourselves, and not left an important message to be handed on by word of mouth.
translation.ja: 大事なことを伝言するなんて間違ってた

translation.en: However, the mistake has been made, and the only thing to do is to set it right.
translation.ja: とにかく誤りは正さないといけないわ

translation.en: I suppose the asylum will take her back, won't they?
translation.ja: この子を孤児院に戻せる？

translation.en: I suppose, but it might not be necessary to return her.
translation.ja: ええ　たぶん でも必要ないかも

translation.en: My neighbor, Mrs. Blewett, was just saying to me she's overburdened by her large family,
translation.ja: 近所のブルエット夫人は子供が多くて―

translation.en: and she wishes she'd sent for a girl to help.
translation.ja: 手伝いの子を望んでるの

translation.en: Anne will do nicely.
translation.ja: アンならピッタリよ

translation.en: I call this positively providential.
translation.ja: アンならピッタリよ 神のご意志ね

translation.en: We'll call on her and see. I'm sure she'll agree.
translation.ja: すぐにお話しましょう

translation.en: -How old are you and what's your name? -Anne Shirley. I'm just 13.
translation.ja: 年と名前は？ アン･シャーリー　13歳です

translation.en: Hmm. You don't look as if there's much to you. But you're wiry.
translation.ja: アン･シャーリー　13歳です 不器量だけど丈夫そうだ

translation.en: I don't know, but the wiry ones are the best after all.
translation.ja: 丈夫が一番だからね

translation.en: If I take you, you'll do as I say, and speak when spoken to.
translation.ja: うちでは言いつけを守ること

translation.en: I don't suffer no backtalk. If I find you lacking, you'll know the toe of my boot.
translation.ja: 口答えは厳禁サボったら蹴飛ばすよ

translation.en: I expect you to earn your keep, and no mistake.
translation.ja: 食べる分は働きな

translation.en: I'm at my wits' end with this one. He'll be the death of me.
translation.ja: まったく よく泣く子だ

translation.en: That's a colic cry.
translation.ja: たそがれ泣きよ

translation.en: [Mrs. Blewett] What?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: [Anne] He'll do better if you swaddle him.
translation.ja: くるむといいの

translation.en: And gripe water helps.
translation.ja: グライプウォーターも効く

translation.en: -Anne has worked for large families. -And work she will.
translation.ja: 子守に慣れてるの きっちり働いてもらうよ

translation.en: This ain't no charity house.
translation.ja: きっちり働いてもらうよ

translation.en: I suppose I can take her off your hands, Miss Cuthbert. If you like, I can take her now.
translation.ja: そちらが良ければすぐにでも

translation.en: W-Well, I-I don't know.
translation.ja: どうしましょうかね

translation.en: I... I didn't say Matthew and I
translation.ja: どうしましょうかね 引き取らないと決めたわけではないの

translation.en: had absolutely decided we wouldn't keep her.
translation.ja: 引き取らないと決めたわけではないの

translation.en: I... I just came over to find out how the mistake had occurred.
translation.ja: 引き取らないと決めたわけではないの 手違いを確認しにきただけで

translation.en: I'd better take her home again, and talk it over with my brother.
translation.ja: 一度 帰って弟と相談します

translation.en: I ought not to decide on anything without consulting him.
translation.ja: 何事も話し合って決めてるの

translation.en: If we make up our minds not to keep her, we'll send her over to you.
translation.ja: 譲ると決めたら連れてくるわ

translation.en: Otherwise, you can assume that she'll be staying with us.
translation.ja: 来なければ引き取ったと思って

translation.en: Will that suit you, Mrs. Blewett?
translation.ja: いいかしら？

translation.en: -I suppose it'll have to. -Very well.
translation.ja: 仕方ないわね それでは

translation.en: Good day.
translation.ja: さようなら

translation.en: Oh, Miss Cuthbert, did you really say that perhaps you'd let me stay at Green Gables,
translation.ja: カスバートさん 引き取ると言ったのは私の妄想かしら？

translation.en: or did I only imagine that you did?
translation.ja: 引き取ると言ったのは私の妄想かしら？

translation.en: Yes, I did say that and no more.
translation.ja: 確かに言ったわよ

translation.en: But it isn't decided yet,
translation.ja: でも決定じゃない

translation.en: and perhaps we'll conclude that Mrs. Blewett should take you after all.
translation.ja: 結局はブルエットさんに譲るかも

translation.en: Well, I'd rather go back to the asylum than live with her.
translation.ja: あそこなら孤児院の方がマシ

translation.en: I keep expecting her to chase after us on a broomstick.
translation.ja: ブルエットさんが追ってくるかと

translation.en: I would like you to hold your tongue on the ride home.
translation.ja: 帰りの道中は口を閉じてて

translation.en: I've got plenty to think about.
translation.ja: 考えたいから

translation.en: I'll thank you to keep your questions to yourself till we can speak in private.
translation.ja: 今は聞かないで後で話しますよ

translation.en: Run along inside. Put your bag upstairs, and put the kettle on.
translation.ja: 中に入って お湯を沸かして

translation.en: Yes, Miss Cuthbert.
translation.ja: 分かりました

translation.en: Oh, wipe that silly grin off your face!
translation.ja: ニヤニヤしないで

translation.en: [Matthew] I wouldn't give a dog I liked to that Blewett woman.
translation.ja: あんな女には犬でも譲れん

translation.en: Trouble is I don't know about keeping her.
translation.ja: まだ迷ってるの

translation.en: She's an interesting little thing.
translation.ja: 面白い子だぞ

translation.en: It'd be more to the point if she was a useful little thing.
translation.ja: 役立つがどうかが問題よ

translation.en: I propose we give her a one-week trial to see how she behaves. She has five days.
translation.ja: ５日間 うちに置いて様子を見てみましょう

translation.en: I'll need a lot of convincing, that's for certain.
translation.ja: 納得して引き取りたい

translation.en: Oh, for heaven's sake!
translation.ja: ニヤけないで

translation.en: I noticed last night that you threw your clothes all about the floor when you took them off.
translation.ja: ゆうべは服を脱ぎっぱなしにしてたわね

translation.en: That is a very untidy habit, and I can't allow it.
translation.ja: だらしないのは許しませんよ

translation.en: You must fold your clothing neatly, and place it on the chair.
translation.ja: たたんでイスの上に置くこと

translation.en: I haven't any use for little girls who aren't neat.
translation.ja: 行儀の悪い子は要らない

translation.en: I was so harrowed up in my mind last night that I didn't think about my clothes at all.
translation.ja: ゆうべは悲しみに暮れていたからよ

translation.en: I'll fold them nicely tonight.
translation.ja: 今日は たたみます

translation.en: Although, I have been known to forget. I'm usually in such a hurry to finally get to bed.
translation.ja: でも早くベッドに入りたくてよく忘れちゃうの

translation.en: Well, you'll have to remember if you're gonna stay here.
translation.ja: うちにいたければ守って

translation.en: You understand that you're on trial, yes?
translation.ja: まだお試しの期間よ

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: A decision will be made in one week.
translation.ja: １週間で結論を出す

translation.en: Now... say your prayers and get into bed.
translation.ja: 寝る前にお祈りを

translation.en: I never say any prayers.
translation.ja: したことないの

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: Well, I said them at the asylum Sunday School. I liked the catechism.
translation.ja: 日曜学校では教理問答を習ったわ

translation.en: [exhales] There's something splendid about some of the words.
translation.ja: あの中にもステキな言葉が

translation.en: "Infinite and unchangeable."
translation.ja: “無限にして不変”

translation.en: It's not quite poetry, but it sounds a lot like it, doesn't it?
translation.ja: 詩ではないけど響きが詩的だわ

translation.en: We're not talking about poetry, Anne, we're talking about prayers.
translation.ja: 詩ではなくお祈りの話をしてるの

translation.en: Don't you know it's a terrible wicked thing not to say your prayers every night?
translation.ja: お祈りをしないのはとても悪いことよ

translation.en: I'm sorry. I-I-I was never taught to say them.
translation.ja: しなさいと言われたことなくて

translation.en: You must say your prayers while you're under my roof.
translation.ja: うちでは必ず祈って

translation.en: Of course. If you want me to. I'd do anything to oblige you.
translation.ja: お望みのことは何でもします

translation.en: [exhales] But you'll have to tell me how to say them, for just this once.
translation.ja: 祈り方を教えて　１度だけ

translation.en: You must kneel down.
translation.ja: ひざまずいて

translation.en: Why must people kneel down to pray?
translation.ja: なぜ こうするの？

translation.en: If I really wanted to pray, I'll tell you what I'd do.
translation.ja: ふさわしい方法かしら？

translation.en: I'd go into a great big field all alone...
translation.ja: 私なら１人で広い原っぱへ行くわ

translation.en: or into the deep, deep woods,
translation.ja: または深い深い森の奥で―

translation.en: and I'd look up into the sky, up up up,
translation.ja: どこまでも高い空を見上げる

translation.en: into that lovely blue sky without end...
translation.ja: 澄んだ青空を見つめながら―

translation.en: and I would just feel a prayer.
translation.ja: 心の中で祈りを捧げるわ

translation.en: Well, I'm ready. What am I to say?
translation.ja: それで？ 何て言うの？

translation.en: You're old enough to pray for yourself.
translation.ja: 自分で考えてごらん

translation.en: Just thank God for your blessings...
translation.ja: まず 神のお恵みに感謝して―

translation.en: and ask Him humbly for the things that you want.
translation.ja: 謙虚な気持ちで願い事をする

translation.en: I'll do my best.
translation.ja: やってみるわ

translation.en: Gracious heavenly Father...
translation.ja: 寛大なる天の父よ

translation.en: That's what ministers say in church, so I suppose it's all right for private prayer? Hmm.
translation.ja: 牧師さんのマネだけど１人でもこれでいい？

translation.en: Gracious heavenly Father...
translation.ja: 寛大なる天の父よ

translation.en: I thank Thee for the White Way of Delight and the Lake of Shining Waters...
translation.ja: これまで 喜びの白い道と輝きの湖と―

translation.en: and for dear Belle and the lovely Snow Queen.
translation.ja: 馬のベル 雪の女王に出会いました

translation.en: I'm really extremely grateful for them.
translation.ja: この出会いに感謝します

translation.en: And that's all the blessings I can think of just now to thank Thee for.
translation.ja: 今のところ感謝はそれだけです

translation.en: And as for the things I want, they're so numerous that it would take me a great deal of time to name them all,
translation.ja: 願い事はありすぎて全部は言えませんので―

translation.en: so I shall only mention the two most important.
translation.ja: 特に大事なのを２つ

translation.en: Please let me stay at Green Gables.
translation.ja: ここに残れますように

translation.en: Please let me be good-looking when I grow up.
translation.ja: 将来 美人になりたい

translation.en: Yours respectfully, Anne Shirley.
translation.ja: かしこ　アン･シャーリー

translation.en: [exhales] There. Did I do it all right?
translation.ja: 終わりよ　どうかしら？

translation.en: That'll do for now.
translation.ja: 今日のところはね

translation.en: Get into bed, child.
translation.ja: さあ 寝なさい

translation.en: Oh, I just realized, I should have said "amen"
translation.ja: 牧師さんは“アーメン”と言うのに

translation.en: in place of "yours respectfully" the way ministers do.
translation.ja: “かしこ”と言ってしまった

translation.en: Do you suppose it'll make any difference?
translation.ja: 願いが叶わない？

translation.en: I don't suppose it will.
translation.ja: きっと平気よ

translation.en: As God is my witness, I will do everything in my earthly power to make you want to keep me.
translation.ja: ここに本気で残りたいって神様に示さないと

translation.en: Good night.
translation.ja: 寝て

translation.en: God, give me strength to succeed in my quest!
translation.ja: 願いが叶うよう お力を

translation.en: That will do.
translation.ja: およし

translation.en: Sorry. I quite like praying.
translation.ja: お祈りが好きになったわ

translation.en: Well, it's time to say good night.
translation.ja: さあ 寝るのよ

translation.en: Good night.
translation.ja: おやすみなさい

translation.en: That girl's next door to a perfect heathen.
translation.ja: まるで異教徒のようだわ

translation.en: God only knows what we're getting ourselves into.
translation.ja: この先は“神のみぞ知る”ね

translation.en: Anne!
translation.ja: アン

translation.en: [shouts] Anne!
translation.ja: アン！

translation.en: -She's gone! -Gone?
translation.ja: いないわ 何だと？

translation.en: I'll check the silverware.
translation.ja: 銀食器は無事？

translation.en: Eggs! That's one chore done!
translation.ja: 卵よ ニワトリたちにも自己紹介を済ませたわ

translation.en: And now I've met all the chickens, so you don't need to make any introductions!
translation.ja: ニワトリたちにも自己紹介を済ませたわ

translation.en: I've been up since before the sun. I was too excited to sleep.
translation.ja: 興奮して早起きしちゃった

translation.en: And I wanted to start proving to you that I should stay.
translation.ja: 役に立つと示したかったの

translation.en: It's so easy to love Green Gables, isn't it?
translation.ja: ここは本当にステキ

translation.en: I'll let the milkers out to graze.
translation.ja: 牛を放してくる

translation.en: I'll have breakfast on soon.
translation.ja: すぐに朝食を

translation.en: -May I take these blossoms up to my room? -No!
translation.ja: 花を飾っても？ ダメよ

translation.en: You don't want your room or your person cluttered up with flowers. You should have left them on the tree.
translation.ja: 花は摘まずに野に咲かせておくものです

translation.en: I felt that way, too. I shouldn't shorten their lovely lives by picking them.
translation.ja: そうよね折ったらしおれちゃう

translation.en: I mean, I wouldn't want to be picked if I were a blossom.
translation.ja: 私が桜だったら嫌だわ

translation.en: Wouldn't it be lovely to be a blossom?
translation.ja: 桜の花になりたい

translation.en: Yesterday, you wanted to be a seagull.
translation.ja: 昨日はカモメになりたいと

translation.en: ♪ And the power and the glory Forever, amen ♪
translation.ja: “栄えとは永遠に汝(なんじ)のもの” “アーメン”

translation.en: [chuckles] I like this prayer. It's lovely.
translation.ja: このお祈り ステキだわ

translation.en: "Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name!"
translation.ja: 天の父よその名を崇(あが)めさせたまえ

translation.en: It's like a line of music.
translation.ja: 歌詞みたい

translation.en: Just get on with the business of learning it.
translation.ja: いいから覚えなさい

translation.en: Regardless of the outcome here,
translation.ja: 何はともあれ―

translation.en: you should have something to wear besides that flimsy bit of business.
translation.ja: そんなボロを着せてはおけない

translation.en: I have a leftover piece of cotton on a bolt that may do nicely.
translation.ja: 木綿の生地の余りがあったわね

translation.en: You're going to make me a dress?
translation.ja: 私に服を作るの？

translation.en: You need something suitable that fits you.
translation.ja: まともな服が必要よ

translation.en: A new dress! Well, I've never had a new dress, not ever!
translation.ja: 新しい服なんて初めてだわ

translation.en: I can't wait to have puff sleeves and ever so many flounces!
translation.ja: 膨らんだ袖とひだをつける？

translation.en: Think you can adorn it with lace at the cuff and neckline, too?
translation.ja: レースの縁取りも

translation.en: I don't believe in frills or flounces.
translation.ja: ひだも縁取りも不要

translation.en: But surely you don't mind puff sleeves? All the girls are wearing them.
translation.ja: 膨らんだ袖は？みんな着てるわ

translation.en: Puff sleeves are divine.
translation.ja: ステキなの

translation.en: -Waste of fabric. -Oh.
translation.ja: 生地の無駄です

translation.en: Well, I-I'm sure if it's a lovely azure blue or willow green,
translation.ja: 色は明るい青か柳の葉の緑がいいな

translation.en: I'm sure I won't mind if it's...
translation.ja: 形は普通でも…

translation.en: plain.
translation.ja: いいから

translation.en: You're a vain one and no mistake. Brown is a very sensible color.
translation.ja: 見た目にこだわりすぎよ茶色が無難でいい

translation.en: I'll need your dress, so I can use it for a pattern.
translation.ja: その服で型紙を取るわ

translation.en: Let's take these things off now.
translation.ja: 脱いでちょうだい

translation.en: Thank you, Miss Cuthbert.
translation.ja: どうもありがとう

translation.en: I've very grateful to have something new. Really I am.
translation.ja: 新しい服が楽しみです

translation.en: I'm sure I can imagine it's fashionable.
translation.ja: 色と形は想像で補う

translation.en: [exhales] Shouldn't take me but a day or two.
translation.ja: １～２日でできる

translation.en: If it looks just like this one, it shouldn't take you any time at all.
translation.ja: これと同じならすぐにできるわ

translation.en: You run along now and learn the prayer.
translation.ja: お祈りの言葉を覚えて

translation.en: Yes, Miss Cuthbert.
translation.ja: 分かりました

translation.en: "Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy..."
translation.ja: 天にまします我らの父よ

translation.en: Puff sleeves!
translation.ja: 膨らんだ袖なんて

translation.en: -Morning, Marilla. -Morning, Rachel.
translation.ja: おはよう レイチェル

translation.en: I brought you some scones.
translation.ja: スコーンよ

translation.en: I felt for sure you wouldn't have time for baking, what with all the hubbub.
translation.ja: 子供がいて焼く暇がないでしょ

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: I'll just come in and sit a spell, shall I?
translation.ja: 少し休ませてくれる？

translation.en: Catch my breath.
translation.ja: 息切れが

translation.en: I've been hearing some surprising things about you and Matthew.
translation.ja: 女の子だったんですって？

translation.en: I don't suppose you're any more surprised than I am myself.
translation.ja: あなた以上に私も驚いてる

translation.en: What an incredible mistake.
translation.ja: 手違いにも程があるわ

translation.en: [sighs] The mind reels.
translation.ja: 信じられない

translation.en: Couldn't you have just sent her back?
translation.ja: 返さないの？

translation.en: We may yet.
translation.ja: 分からない

translation.en: But for now, she's here on trial.
translation.ja: 試しに少し置いてみるわ

translation.en: -Trial? -One week.
translation.ja: 試し？ １週間ね

translation.en: Matthew is quite set on keeping her.
translation.ja: マシューが気に入ってる

translation.en: And I'll admit she's a bright little thing, but I'll need a great deal more convincing.
translation.ja: 確かに いい子だけど私はちゃんと納得したい

translation.en: I know it by heart, Miss Cuthbert!
translation.ja: すっかり覚えました

translation.en: Anne, this is our neighbor, Mrs. Lynde.
translation.ja: アン こちらはリンド夫人よ

translation.en: Well, they didn't pick you for your looks, that's sure and certain.
translation.ja: おや 見た目では選んでないのね

translation.en: She's terribly skinny and homely, Marilla.
translation.ja: 痩せっぽちで不器量

translation.en: All elbows and knees. [laughs]
translation.ja: まさに骨と皮だわ

translation.en: Did you ever see such freckles?
translation.ja: そばかす顔にニンジンみたいな赤毛

translation.en: And hair as red as carrots! Dear, dear me.
translation.ja: そばかす顔にニンジンみたいな赤毛 まったく

translation.en: -I hate you. -[Marilla] Anne...
translation.ja: 許さない アン

translation.en: -I hate you, I hate you, I hate you! -Anne!
translation.ja: 絶対に許せない！

translation.en: How dare you call me skinny and ugly! And how dare you call me freckled and redheaded!
translation.ja: 骨と皮だとかそばかす顔で赤毛だとか―

translation.en: You are a rude, unfeeling woman!
translation.ja: 失礼で血も涙もない人ね

translation.en: How would you like to have such things said about you?
translation.ja: 逆の立場だったら？

translation.en: H-How would you like to be told that you're fat and clumsy,
translation.ja: あなたは太ってて― 不器量で想像力のない人と言われたら？

translation.en: and that you probably hadn't a spark of imagination in you?
translation.ja: 不器量で想像力のない人と言われたら？

translation.en: And I don't care if I hurt your feelings by saying so.
translation.ja: 私を怒っても構わない

translation.en: I hope I hurt them!
translation.ja: 傷つけばいいわ

translation.en: Because you have hurt my feelings worse than they have ever been hurt before!
translation.ja: あなたの言葉に私は深く傷ついた

translation.en: [shouts] And I will never forgive you for this! Never, never!
translation.ja: 一生 許しません 絶対に！

translation.en: Anne!
translation.ja: アン

translation.en: Come back here! Anne!
translation.ja: 戻りなさい アン

translation.en: I never.
translation.ja: 驚いた

translation.en: It's a good thing you can send her back. I wouldn't envy you the job of bringing that up.
translation.ja: あんな子は孤児院に送り返しなさい

translation.en: You shouldn't have twitted her about her looks.
translation.ja: 容姿をけなすなんて

translation.en: Marilla Cuthbert.
translation.ja: ねえ　マリラ

translation.en: You don't mean to tell me that you are upholding her
translation.ja: あの子をかばうつもりじゃないわよね

translation.en: in such a terrible display of temper as we've just seen?
translation.ja: あの子をかばうつもりじゃないわよね ひどい かんしゃく持ちよ

translation.en: I am not trying to excuse her.
translation.ja: かばう気はないわ

translation.en: She has been very naughty, and I'll have to give her a talking-to about it.
translation.ja: 確かに不作法だったわ言って聞かせる

translation.en: But we must make allowances for her. She's never been taught what is right.
translation.ja: でも大目に見ないと作法を教わってない

translation.en: And you were too hard on her.
translation.ja: あなたも言い過ぎよ

translation.en: Well...
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: I can see now I'm gonna have to be very careful what I say after this...
translation.ja: 今後は言葉を選ぶようにするわ

translation.en: since the fine feelings of orphans, brought from goodness-knows-where, have to be considered before anything else.
translation.ja: どこの馬の骨かも知れない孤児の気持ちが一番みたいね

translation.en: -Now, now! -Oh, no, no.
translation.ja: そんな… いいのよ

translation.en: I'm not vexed.
translation.ja: 怒ってないわ

translation.en: Don't worry yourself.
translation.ja: 心配しないで

translation.en: I feel too sorry for you to have any anger left in my mind.
translation.ja: あなたが気の毒で怒る気になれない

translation.en: But if you will take my advice,
translation.ja: でも いいこと？

translation.en: you will have that "talking-to" with a fair-sized birch switch.
translation.ja: 言い聞かせるなら枝のムチでたたくといい

translation.en: And get her on the next train out.
translation.ja: そして追い出して

translation.en: Goodbye, Marilla.
translation.ja: それじゃ

translation.en: [Matthew] It's been quite a spell.
translation.ja: 遅いな

translation.en: She'll make her own way home.
translation.ja: いずれ戻るわ

translation.en: I could go.
translation.ja: 捜しに行くか

translation.en: She's in her underthings, so she's gotta come back.
translation.ja: 下着姿だから帰ってきますよ

translation.en: -The girl needs to learn some sense. -[exhales]
translation.ja: 行儀をしつけないと

translation.en: I'm sorry. I shouldn't have lost my temper
translation.ja: 悪かったわ 恥をかかせてしまってごめんなさい

translation.en: and embarrassed you in front of Mrs. Lynde. I hope you can forgive me.
translation.ja: 恥をかかせてしまってごめんなさい

translation.en: -Are you all right? -Yes.
translation.ja: 大丈夫かい？ はい

translation.en: I'm sorry for worrying you. I needed time to ponder.
translation.ja: 考える時間が欲しかったの

translation.en: If you let me stay, I will do my very best not to fly into another temper ever again.
translation.ja: 置いてもらえるならもう取り乱しません

translation.en: I appreciate that you're contrite, Anne...
translation.ja: 反省はいいことよ

translation.en: but the person that you owe the apology to is Mrs. Lynde.
translation.ja: でも謝罪はリンドさんに

translation.en: But she hadn't any right to call me ugly and redheaded.
translation.ja: 私を赤毛で不器量だと

translation.en: [Marilla] You say it yourself often enough.
translation.ja: 自分でも言ってる

translation.en: But there's a difference between saying a thing yourself and hearing other people say it.
translation.ja: 他の人に言われるのとは全然違うの

translation.en: You need to learn discipline.
translation.ja: 我慢を覚えなさい

translation.en: Just imagine how you would feel if someone told you to your face that you were skinny and ugly.
translation.ja: 痩せっぽちで不器量と言われても？

translation.en: Remember when we were young, Marilla, old lady Adams said--
translation.ja: 子供の頃 言われたな

translation.en: -Yes. -That you were gawky--
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: -Yes. Thank you. -I recall you suffered from it--
translation.ja: 不細工だとか… 覚えてる

translation.en: I don't say Mrs. Lynde was exactly right in saying what she did to you, Anne.
translation.ja: ひどいことを言ったリンドさんも悪い

translation.en: -She's too outspoken. -She's a bully.
translation.ja: 口が過ぎる 意地悪よ

translation.en: But that is no excuse for such behavior on your part.
translation.ja: だからってあんな態度はダメ

translation.en: You were rude and saucy, and you must go to Mrs. Lynde
translation.ja: 無礼で生意気よ リンドさんにちゃんと謝りなさい

translation.en: and tell her that you're sorry and ask her to forgive you.
translation.ja: リンドさんにちゃんと謝りなさい

translation.en: I could never do that. Punish me any way you like.
translation.ja: 絶対にイヤ 地下牢に閉じ込めてお仕置きされても平気

translation.en: Shut me up in a dark, damp dungeon, and I shan't complain,
translation.ja: 地下牢に閉じ込めてお仕置きされても平気

translation.en: but I cannot ask Mrs. Lynde to forgive me.
translation.ja: でも あの人には謝らない

translation.en: We're not in the habit of shutting people up in dungeons.
translation.ja: 地下牢に閉じ込めたりしない

translation.en: But apologize to Mrs. Lynde you must.
translation.ja: でも謝罪はしてもらう

translation.en: And you'll stay up in your room until you can tell me you're willing to do it.
translation.ja: 謝る気になるまで部屋にいなさい

translation.en: I'll have to stay up there forever, then, because I can't tell Mrs. Lynde I'm sorry I said those things to her.
translation.ja: なら一生 部屋にいるわ言い返したこと―

translation.en: How can I? I'm not sorry.
translation.ja: 悪いと思ってないもの

translation.en: I'm sorry I vexed you, but I'm glad I told her just what I did.
translation.ja: あの人に言ってやってよかったと思ってる

translation.en: It was a great satisfaction!
translation.ja: 胸がスッとした

translation.en: In fact, I can't even imagine that I'm sorry.
translation.ja: たとえ想像の中でだって謝りたくない

translation.en: Well, let's hope your imagination is in better working order by morning.
translation.ja: もっと想像力が働くといいけど

translation.en: Y-You can't send her back over this.
translation.ja: 送り返す気じゃなかろうね？

translation.en: Don't be so sure.
translation.ja: 分からないわ

translation.en: Well, it's...
translation.ja: まあ…

translation.en: Well, it's good that, uh, Rachel got a calling-down.
translation.ja: レイチェルの鼻をへし折れてよかった

translation.en: -Wish I'd been there. -Matthew Cuthbert, I'm astonished at you.
translation.ja: 見たかった マシュー　何てこと言うの

translation.en: And you'll take her up a meal.
translation.ja: 部屋へ食事を

translation.en: When did you ever hear of me starving people into good behavior?
translation.ja: 食事抜きなんて罰は与えません

translation.en: She'll stay up there until she's willing to apologize, and that is final.
translation.ja: でも謝る気になるまで許さないわ

translation.en: How's by you, Anne?
translation.ja: 平気かい？

translation.en: I'm fairly well, thank you. I imagine a good deal, so that helps to pass the time.
translation.ja: ええ　ありがとう 想像して時間をつぶしてるの

translation.en: Don't you think you better, um, say it?
translation.ja: 思い切って謝ってみてはどうだ？

translation.en: Just have it over with?
translation.ja: 思い切って謝ってみてはどうだ？ できるだろ？

translation.en: If I apologize, I'll be fibbing.
translation.ja: ウソになるわ

translation.en: It'll have to be done sooner or later, for Marilla's, um...
translation.ja: だが いつかは謝らなきゃならんぞ 何せマリラは―

translation.en: a dreadful determined woman, dreadful determined.
translation.ja: ひどく頑固で折れない人間だ

translation.en: So am I.
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: It's, uh...
translation.ja: その…

translation.en: It's terrible lonesome downstairs without you.
translation.ja: お前が下に降りてこないと寂しい

translation.en: I'm not used to the quiet anymore.
translation.ja: 静かだと落ち着かん

translation.en: The trouble is that the prospect seems humiliating and unfair.
translation.ja: 本心じゃないのに謝るなんてできない

translation.en: But you're smart enough...
translation.ja: お前は賢いから―

translation.en: to find the right words, I'm sure of it.
translation.ja: うまい言い方ができるさ

translation.en: But why should the apology have to come from me when it was Mrs. Lynde who caused the entire situation?
translation.ja: リンドさんが間違ってるのになぜ私が謝るの？

translation.en: I like to think that...
translation.ja: 私は想像するんだ

translation.en: that one fine day, it won't matter a whit to you
translation.ja: いつかお前は誰に何を言われようと―

translation.en: what anybody says sideways.
translation.ja: 気にしなくなるだろう

translation.en: You have a good imagination.
translation.ja: 想像力が豊かね

translation.en: I suppose it would be true enough to say I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 謝れる気がしてきたマリラさんに悪かったもの

translation.en: I am sorry I upset Miss Marilla. And you.
translation.ja: 謝れる気がしてきたマリラさんに悪かったもの あなたにも

translation.en: So go and smooth things over, can't you?
translation.ja: 早いとこ面倒を片づけておいで

translation.en: Very well. I'll attempt it. For you.
translation.ja: お２人のためにやってみるわ

translation.en: Now that's good news.
translation.ja: これで安心したよ

translation.en: Don't tell Marilla we had a conversation,
translation.ja: 今の会話はマリラに内緒だぞ

translation.en: on account of we decided raising you was her department.
translation.ja: お前のしつけは任せてるんだ

translation.en: I shall carry our secret to my grave.
translation.ja: 一生の秘密にするわ

translation.en: Whatever you're thinking, Anne...
translation.ja: 分かってるわね？

translation.en: I hope you're taking this seriously.
translation.ja: 心を込めて謝るの

translation.en: Oh, I am. I'm imagining out what I must say to Mrs. Lynde.
translation.ja: ええ謝罪の言葉は考えてあるの

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. Lynde, I am so extremely sorry! I could never express my sorrow, no!
translation.ja: リンドさん本当にごめんなさい 言葉で表せないほど悔やんでいます

translation.en: Not even if I used up a whole dictionary.
translation.ja: 言葉で表せないほど悔やんでいます

translation.en: I behaved terribly to you, and I've disgraced my dear friends, the Cuthberts,
translation.ja: 大変な無礼をして― 寛大なマリラさんたちの顔に泥を塗りました

translation.en: who may let me stay at Green Gables, even though I'm not a boy.
translation.ja: 寛大なマリラさんたちの顔に泥を塗りました

translation.en: I am a dreadfully wicked and ungrateful girl,
translation.ja: 恩知らずな悪い私は

translation.en: and I deserve to be punished and cast out by respectful society forever.
translation.ja: 罰せられ のけ者にされて当然です

translation.en: It was awful of me to fly into a temper because you told me the truth.
translation.ja: 取り乱したのは― リンドさんの言葉が事実だからです

translation.en: And it was the truth. Every word you said was true.
translation.ja: リンドさんの言葉が事実だからです 一言残らず 正しいわ

translation.en: My hair is red, and I am freckled and skinny and ugly.
translation.ja: 私は赤毛でそばかす顔で痩せてて不器量

translation.en: What I said to you was true, too, but I shouldn't have said it!
translation.ja: 事実とはいえ私も言い過ぎました

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. Lynde! Please, please, say you can forgive me.
translation.ja: 事実とはいえ私も言い過ぎました どうかお許しを

translation.en: If you refuse, it'll be a lifelong sorrow on a poor little orphan girl.
translation.ja: もしダメなら― 哀れな私は一生 悲しむでしょう

translation.en: Please, say you forgive me, Mrs. Lynde!
translation.ja: どうか お許しください

translation.en: There, there. Get up, child.
translation.ja: もう立ってちょうだい

translation.en: Of course I forgive you.
translation.ja: もちろん許すわ

translation.en: I guess I was a little hard on you, but I'm just an outspoken person.
translation.ja: 私も口が過ぎた こういうタチだから気にしないで

translation.en: You mustn't mind me, that's what I say.
translation.ja: こういうタチだから気にしないで

translation.en: Thank you for your kind consideration.
translation.ja: お心遣いに感謝します

translation.en: I look forward to never minding what you say again.
translation.ja: 気にしないよう心掛けます

translation.en: -[exhales] -Indeed.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: Although, it can't be denied your hair is terrible red. But there may be hope for it.
translation.ja: 赤毛なのは仕方ないけど希望はあるわ

translation.en: There was a girl in our class who had hair every bit as red as yours.
translation.ja: 私の同級生にも赤毛の子がいたのよ

translation.en: Do you recall, Marilla?
translation.ja: 覚えてる？

translation.en: But when she grew up, it darkened to a real handsome auburn.
translation.ja: 大人になったらきれいなとび色に変わった

translation.en: I wouldn't be a mite surprised if yours did, too.
translation.ja: あなたも変わるかもね

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. Lynde, you've given me hope!
translation.ja: 希望が持てました

translation.en: I shall always remember that you were a benefactor--
translation.ja: あなたを恩人と思います

translation.en: We should run along, Rachel.
translation.ja: そろそろ行くわ

translation.en: -Thank you for your graciousness. -Of course.
translation.ja: ありがとう いいのよ

translation.en: She has a queer way of expressing herself.
translation.ja: 表現が独特な子ね

translation.en: Forcible, like.
translation.ja: 説得力はある

translation.en: I apologized pretty well, didn't I?
translation.ja: うまくいったでしょ？

translation.en: I thought since I had to do it, I might as well do it thoroughly.
translation.ja: どうせなら念入りにしたくて

translation.en: Oh, you did it thoroughly all right.
translation.ja: 確かに念入りだったわ

translation.en: I hope you try to control your temper better in the future.
translation.ja: かんしゃくは封印するのよ

translation.en: I will. I absolutely will.
translation.ja: もちろん気をつけるわ
